keywords.name: description
keywords.description: 本组件用于从底部弹出一个操作菜单，供用户选择并返回结果。本组件功能类似于uni的uni.showActionSheetAPI，配置更加灵活，所有平台都表现一致。

keywords.name: tutorial
keywords.description: https://www.uviewui.com/components/actionSheet.html

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {Boolean}			show				操作菜单是否展示 （默认 false ）

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {String}			title				操作菜单标题

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {String}			description			选项上方的描述信息

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {Array<Object>}	actions				按钮的文字数组，见官方文档示例

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {String}			cancelText			取消按钮的提示文字,不为空时显示按钮

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {Boolean}			closeOnClickAction	点击某个菜单项时是否关闭弹窗 （默认 true ）

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {Boolean}			safeAreaInsetBottom	处理底部安全区 （默认 true ）

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {String}			openType			小程序的打开方式 (contact | launchApp | getUserInfo | openSetting ｜getPhoneNumber ｜error )

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {Boolean}			closeOnClickOverlay	点击遮罩是否允许关闭  (默认 true )

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {Number|String}	round				圆角值，默认无圆角  (默认 0 )

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {String}			lang				指定返回用户信息的语言，zh_CN 简体中文，zh_TW 繁体中文，en 英文

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {String}			sessionFrom			会话来源，openType="contact"时有效

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {String}			sendMessageTitle	会话内消息卡片标题，openType="contact"时有效

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {String}			sendMessagePath		会话内消息卡片点击跳转小程序路径，openType="contact"时有效

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {String}			sendMessageImg		会话内消息卡片图片，openType="contact"时有效

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {Boolean}			showMessageCard		是否显示会话内消息卡片，设置此参数为 true，用户进入客服会话会在右下角显示"可能要发送的小程序"提示，用户点击后可以快速发送小程序消息，openType="contact"时有效 （默认 false ）

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: {String}			appParameter		打开 APP 时，向 APP 传递的参数，openType=launchApp 时有效

keywords.name: event
keywords.description: {Function} select			点击ActionSheet列表项时触发

keywords.name: event
keywords.description: {Function} close			点击取消按钮时触发

keywords.name: event
keywords.description: {Function} getuserinfo	用户点击该按钮时，会返回获取到的用户信息，回调的 detail 数据与 wx.getUserInfo 返回的一致，openType="getUserInfo"时有效

keywords.name: event
keywords.description: {Function} contact		客服消息回调，openType="contact"时有效

keywords.name: event
keywords.description: {Function} getphonenumber	获取用户手机号回调，openType="getPhoneNumber"时有效

keywords.name: event
keywords.description: {Function} error			当使用开放能力时，发生错误的回调，openType="error"时有效

keywords.name: event
keywords.description: {Function} launchapp		打开 APP 成功的回调，openType="launchApp"时有效

keywords.name: event
keywords.description: {Function} opensetting	在打开授权设置页后回调，openType="openSetting"时有效

keywords.name: example
keywords.description: <u-action-sheet :actions="list" :title="title" :show="show"></u-action-sheet>
